00019 #ifndef YS_TRANSACTION_TYPE_H
00020 #define YS_TRANSACTION_TYPE_H

00022 #include "xmlnode.h"
00023 #include "ys_inv_type.h"

00031 using namespace std;
00032 class YardDatabase;
00033     
00034 class YardTransType: public XMLNode
00035 {
00036  public:
00037    
00038     friend class YardDatabase;
00039       
00040     YardTransType() { setName("Transaction_Log_Table"); }
00041     YardTransType(const string& xml): XMLNode(xml, XMLNode::Str) {}
00042     
00043     void SetCustomer(long id)
00044         { child("TRANS_REF_CUST_Account_Number").setData(ToStr(id)); }
00045     void SetEmployee(long id)
00046         { child("TRANS_REF_EMP_ID_Number").setData(ToStr(id)); }
00047     void SetItem(long id)
00048         { child("TRANS_REF_INV_Item_ID").setData(ToStr(id)); }
00049     void SetQuantity(long num)
00050         { child("TRANS_Quantity").setData(ToStr(num)); }   
00051     void SetSalePrice(double price)
00052         { child("TRANS_Sale_Price").setData(ToStr(price,YS_DEFAULT_MONEY_PRECISION)); } 
00053     void SetTime(YardDate& time)
00054         { 
00055             time.setName("TRANS_Time");
00056             addChild(time);
00057         }
00058         
00059     /* Getters */
00060     string GetSalePriceS() const
00061         { return child("TRANS_Sale_Price").data(); }
00062     double GetSalePrice() const
00063         { return ToDouble(GetSalePriceS()); }  
00064         
00065     string GetEmployeeIdS() const 
00066         { return child("TRANS_REF_EMP_ID_Number").data(); }
00067     long GetEmployeeId() const
00068         { return ToLong(GetEmployeeIdS()); }
00069 
00070     string GetItemS() const
00071         { return child("TRANS_REF_INV_Item_ID").data(); }
00072     long GetItem() const
00073         { return ToLong(GetItemS()); } 
00074 
00075     string GetQuantityS() const
00076         { return child("TRANS_Quantity").data(); }
00077     long GetQuantity() const
00078         { return ToLong(GetQuantityS()); }        
00079     
00080     string GetCustomerIdS() const
00081         { return child("TRANS_REF_CUST_Account_Number").data(); }
00082     long GetCustomerId() const
00083         { return ToLong(GetCustomerIdS()); }
00084     
00085     string GetIdS() const
00086         { return child("TRANS_ID").data(); }
00087     long GetId() const
00088         { return ToLong(GetIdS()); }   
00089         
00090     string GetOldTransRefS() const
00091         { return child("TRANS_REF_TRANS_Old_Trans").data(); }   
00092     long GetOldTransRef() const
00093         { return ToLong(GetOldTransRefS()); }
00094         
00095     string GetComment() const
00096         { return child("TRANS_Comment").data(); }
00097         
00098     YardDate GetTime() const
00099         { return YardDate(child("TRANS_Time")); }
00100         
00101         
00107     virtual string ToString(const string& delim = ",", bool quotes = true) const;   
00108 
00109 };
